title: MERRY CHRISTMAS! Enter promo code HOHOHO for 30% OFF
content:
I hope you're having a happy Christmas with your family and friends.

If you still have not purchased Pixquare already, it is time now. Use promo code HOHOHO to get 30% off.

If you already purchased Pixquare, thank you and enjoy the holidays :)

Best
App creator, Son Nguyen

(This promotion lasts until December 25)

title: Crash when canvas grid is off
content:
There is a bug on v2.46.0 that crashes the app if the canvas grid is disabled. I've submitted a patch to fix that and it's waiting to be reviewed. In the meantime, please enable canvas grid to avoid this crash.

Thank you for your understanding.

title: Cannot create new tile bug
content:
There is a bug on v2.48.0 that prevents new tile creation on new empty tilemap layer. I'm sorry for this bug, and a new version has been submitted for review to fix this issue. In the meantime, a workaround is to create new tilemap layers from regular layers.

Thank you for your understanding.
